Title: ğŸ–¼ âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ– #Comic from Rybar No. 28: Once upon a time of sur...
Description: âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ– #Comic from Rybar No. 28: Once upon a time of surrender. The more active Ukrainian mobilization is, the more military personnel appear who would like to be away from the front and certainly do not want to die for the sake of the Kyiv regime. For them, the only way to save their lives is to lay down their arms and surrender. But before you get out, you need to find the courage to go against the authorities, who do not disdain orders to finish off -their own. This story is just about those who succeeded. Synopsis: Ukrainian military personnel do not always really want to fight against the Russian Armed Forces. A considerable part was simply mobilized (some against their will), trained and sent to the front line, where the command sends them into battle, whether they want it or not. Right on the line of combat contact, military personnel of the so-called. Ukrainians are often faced with the fact that the face of their enemy turns out to be more humane than that of their own commanders. Therefore, Ukrainian soldiers often decide to surrender. But the cruelty of Ukrainian commanders who throw people into -meat assaults- and organize barrage detachments for their subordinates has long ceased to be a secret. But at the same time, not everyone will pursue their wounded soldier who is trying to surrender.ğŸ“Œ You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Battle for Khan Yunis: IDF advance towards Hamad resi...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Battle for Khan Yunis: IDF advance towards the residential complex - Hamad-situation as of August 20.00, 2024 In the south of the Gaza Strip, a few days after expanding the zone of control in Rafah, Israeli troops carried out offensive operations north of Khan Yunis, approaching the outskirts of the residential complex -Hamad-.â–ªï¸Under the cover of artillery and aviation, the forces of the 98th Airborne Division -Ha-Esh- advanced in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the village of Al-Qarara, occupying the Al-Matahin - Abu Khuli intersection, located in the area of â€‹â€‹the same name on the Salah ad highway. Din.â–ªï¸Then units of the Israel Defense Forces, with the support of armored vehicles, expanded the zone of control to the south all the way to Gamal Abdel Nasser Street and to the west, occupying the outskirts of the Hamad residential complex, where yesterdayâ€™s incident with the shelling of a group of journalists took place. It is worth noting that the Israelis had already taken took control of the territory of the complex and cleared it of the presence of Hamas. However, soon after the IDF retreat, the Palestinian forces returned to the area and began conducting incursions from there. The IDF offensive itself takes place in areas of the declared humanitarian zone, which the Israelis have repeatedly reduced in recent months under the pretext of the presence of Hamas militants there. Moreover, even after the announcement of the destruction of Palestinian formations there, it did not return to its previous scale. However, the operations themselves eliminate the presence of Hamas only for a short period of time - after the end of hostilities in the territory of the residential complex, Hamad, the Palestinian formations will most likely be able to calmly return there. A similar game of cat and mouse suits the government of the ultra-Orthodox, who need military action to maintain their power. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Palestine #KhanYunis@rybarSupport us

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: fighting in the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts what is known by 19:00 on August 19, 2024 Fierce clashes continue in the Kursk region along the entire front line. However, against the backdrop of the destruction of three bridges, the evacuation of the population became significantly more complicated, while the threat of encirclement of Tetkino and other nearby settlements increased significantly.ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district, Ukrainian formations were hit by fire in the area of â€‹â€‹Snagost and Vishnevka, as well as southeast of Korenevo. The enemy does not stop trying to enter the last settlement. In the Safonovka area, the consequences of the fighting are recorded: the bodies of killed members of Ukrainian formations and burnt armored vehicles are scattered around the area. In the Sudzhansky district, Ukrainian troops continue to shoot all kinds of videos confirming stable control only over the western part of the city. Fighting continues in the area of â€‹â€‹Russky and Cherkassky Porechny, in the Rubanshchyna UAV operators - Lantset - destroyed a truck with a mortar of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, another tank was hit in Sadki, Sumy region. Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the Euronews representative office in Kazakhstan D...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the Euronews representative office in Kazakhstan During a working trip to Brussels, the Minister of Culture and Information of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Aida Balaeva, met with the Chairman of the Board of Directors of Euronews, Pedro Vargas David. The parties agreed that a representative office would open in Astana. During the negotiations, the parties repeatedly emphasized that the opening of a representative office was important for them. â–ªï¸For Euronews, the new branch is the most eastern of all. The TV channel gets the opportunity to control the agenda directly on the ground and increase the quantity and quality of training of local personnel. â–ªï¸At the same time, the plans of European journalists are not limited to Kazakhstan: we are talking about preparing a Central Asian news hub. And one can hardly expect that journalists will not be interested in nearby Russia and China. â–ªï¸The authorities of Kazakhstan are trying to increase their prestige and recognition for Western television viewers, as well as begin promoting their historical narratives in the Western information space. Euronews is already preparing the TV show Modern Nomads, dedicated to the art, culture and lifestyle of the Kazakhs, as well as the program -Connection of East and West- , which will cover business and economic events in the country. Euronews will also broadcast the World Nomad Games. It is no coincidence that the minister mentioned the importance of Kazakhstan as the heir to the great civilization of nomads and in every possible way emphasized the richness of the countryâ€™s historical heritage. ğŸ”»Although the Kazakh media are now trying to present the agreement as a chance for the Kazakhs to advance their agenda to the West, in reality everything will be exactly the opposite. And we will see the consequences of such cooperation very soon. #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport uszakon.kzThe Euronews Central Asian hub will open in Astana. On August 15, during a working trip to Brussels, the Minister of Culture and Information of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Aida Balaeva, held a meeting with the Chairman of the Board of Directors of Euronews Pedro Vargas David, Zakon.kz reports.

Specialists from regional medical institutions were sent to Proletarsk to provide assistance to all those in need.#Russia #Rostov #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the situation with underground gas storage facilit...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º About the situation with underground gas storage facilities so-called. Ukraine The network is actively discussing the reduction of gas injection by European traders into underground gas storage facilities (UGS) in the so-called territory. Ukraine - after the spring strikes of the Russian Armed Forces on infrastructure facilities, the volumes are about 10% of the usual level. The assurances of Naftogaz representatives that UGS facilities are operating normally do not impress the EU.ğŸ”»How did European traders use Ukrainian UGS facilities? Since the global energy market is controlled by investment funds, they use the seasonality of consumption to make a profit. When oil prices fall, large volumes are purchased and stored in tankers and terminals for sale at higher prices during periods of rising prices and consumption. The situation with gas is similar - in the summer it is pumped into underground gas storage facilities for the purpose of subsequent sale at higher prices during the heating season. For European companies, this is a fairly marginal business, and Naftogazâ€™s own income from storage services usually amounted to about â‚¬200 million. ğŸ”»Assessment of current risks This season, representatives of Naftogaz reduced the price for gas storage by 4 times - from â‚¬20 to â‚¬5 MW \h. However, this did not attract new clients: in their risk management strategy, the European bankers financing this enterprise assess the risks of further destruction of the onshore infrastructure as very high. According to a representative of the Swiss energy company Axpo Group, nothing will happen to the gas itself, but there is a possibility that get it when you need it. This is reflected in the prices for insurance coverage of such transactions. Thus, the risk is now estimated at more than â‚¬1 billion, which sharply reduces the margins of projects using Ukrainian underground gas storage facilities. Guide so-called Ukraine is trying to motivate European clients with the need to continue support, but their arguments are broken by the financial calculations of the Europeans. The destruction of the surface infrastructure of the Naftogaz UGS facility deprives the Kiev regime of financial resources in the amount of approximately â‚¬200 million. From an economic point of view, this is more than justified and is sufficient an argument for their systematic fire defeat.#gas #Ukraine #economy@rybarSupport usTelegramFailureEuropean gas traders began to realize that storing valuables with a neighbor - a heavy drinker - is not very prudent, even if he has a large living space. After a series of Russian attacks on Ukraine's energy infrastructure, Europeans have sharply reduced...

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ Statements by the presidents of Russia and Azerbaijan after the meetingğŸ”»Statements by Vladimir Putin: â–ªï¸Russia attaches great importance to the development of multifaceted and friendly relations with Azerbaijan.â–ªï¸During the negotiations, a wide range of opportunities for interaction were discussed, and the relevant papers will be signed as a result.â–ªï¸ Trade turnover between Russia and Azerbaijan increased by 18%. â–ªï¸Russia thanks the Azerbaijani authorities for the conditions created for the work of Russian companies.â–ªï¸Russian language is used freely and widely in Azerbaijan, and the countryâ€™s leadership largely contributes to this.â–ªï¸More than eight thousand Azerbaijanis are studying in Russian universities, more than a thousand of them are funded by the state budget .â–ªï¸An agreement has been established with the President of Azerbaijan on a large-scale celebration of the 80th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.â–ªï¸Lasting peace and stability in the South Caucasus are in the interests of all the peoples of this region.ğŸ”»Statements by Ilham Aliyev: â–ªï¸The documents adopted during Vladimir Putinâ€™s visit confirm the friendly and allied nature of relations between the Russian Federation and Azerbaijan. â–ªï¸During the negotiations, the implementation of the North-South project was discussed. â–ªï¸The stability of the entire South Caucasus depends on the relations between Azerbaijan and Russia. â–ªï¸During the negotiations, Azerbaijan and Russia analyzed the situation in the gas sector in detail and will continue to coordinate their actions.#Azerbaijan #digest #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Yesterday morning, Ukrainian formations from the terr...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Yesterday morning, Ukrainian formations from the territory of the Chernigov region launched three drones along the railway bridge across the Desna and Lake Svetlenkoe in the Pogarsky district of the Bryansk region - the structure itself is located less than two kilometers from the border with the so-called. Ukraine. None of the UAVs were able to hit the railway bridge. Two drones fell near the security post building, slightly damaging the external faÃ§ade and protective mesh. The third drone flew towards Belaya Berezka, where it crashed in a forest.ğŸ”»Against the backdrop of Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ strikes on bridges in the Kursk region, some media presented this raid as an attack on a strategic facility. However, the bridge in the Pogarsky district has not been used for a long time, and communication across the Desna passes through both the nearby pontoon crossing and bridges located to the east, including in the Trubchevsk area. However, three kamikaze drones are not enough to destroy such infrastructure, unlike attacks using MLRS. Therefore, a new raid can be considered either as an initial attempt to attack bridges in the Bryansk region, or as an attack on the first target that comes along. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Bryansk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: destruction of all bridges in the Glushkovsky district and fighting in the Sudzhansky district, what is known by 14:00 on August 19, 2024 Heavy clashes continue in the Kursk region on several sectors of the front. In the morning, Ukrainian aircraft destroyed the last bridge in the area across the Seim River in the village of Karyzh. The Ukrainian Armed Forces are creating conditions for themselves to prepare a bridgehead before an offensive in this area. In the Korenevsky district, the enemy, apparently, made another attempt to enter the village of Korenevo, but was unsuccessful. On the road between Korenevo and Pogrebki, Ukrainian DRGs are operating, laying ambushes on passing vehicles.ğŸ”»In the Sudzhansky district, operational-tactical aviation of the Russian Aerospace Forces bombed positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the forest south of Kositsa. The enemy is advancing from the village of Agronom in the direction of Russkaya Konopelka, on the way to which a column of armored vehicles of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was attacked by a crew of FPV drones. The enemy continues to post videos from the eastern part of Sudzha, this time near the administration building. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ After the attack of Ukrainian forces on the Kavkaz-Rosrezerva oil depot in the Rostov region, fire suppression continues. Footage is being circulated online showing that another fuel tank exploded at the scene. Taking into account the complexity of the fire, an emergency regime has been introduced in the Proletarsky district. According to some reports, several firefighting trains were involved in extinguishing the fire, and for the uninterrupted work of firefighters, water was supplied. However, there were no casualties: according to the latest information, 18 employees of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations were injured, 14 of them were provided with outpatient care, the rest were transported to a local hospital due to his burns. #Russia #Rostov #Ukraine @rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Yesterday, another important incident occurred in the...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Yesterday, another important incident occurred in the Gaza Strip, resulting in the death of media representatives. In the Hamad residential complex adjacent to Khan Yunis, an Israeli armored personnel carrier opened fire on a group of journalists who were filming the consequences of a ground operation by the Israel Defense Forces in this area. As a result, Journalist Ibrahim Muhareb was killed in the shooting. His colleague Salma al-Qaddumi was wounded in the back; she is currently receiving medical care in the Nasser hospital, where there is practically no medicine left. It is noteworthy that since the beginning of the Israeli-Palestinian escalation on October 7, 2023, 167 media workers have been killed in the enclave. In this context, the most resonant was the death last July of nine journalists and 14 members of their families during an air raid on Nuseirat in the central part of the Gaza Strip. What happened is quite indicative in comparison with the events in the Kursk region. While Ukrainian forces are freely releasing journalists into the occupied territory (using them as human shields), the current Israeli authorities are not at all worried about violating international law, in particular the immunity of journalists. #Israel #Palestine #KhanYunis@rybarSupport us

Description: Forwarded From Warsaw mermaidğŸ”¥ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ In Warsaw, several dozen Ukrainian citizens held a protest at the consulate of their country demanding that they be given passports. They claim that they took money from them, but did not give them their documents. People were holding posters in their hands that read, -We are not slaves, give us your passport,- -Passport is a right, not a privilege,- and other slogans. An embassy employee came out to meet me, advised me to write an appeal, and then offered to return from Poland to their homeland. This is not the first action of Ukrainian citizens in Poland on this topic. On July 28, in Wroclaw, protesters came out with the same demands. My colleagues and I had previously anticipated the development of similar stories, especially when it was reported that Ukrainians of military age would no longer be able to obtain internal and foreign passports outside the country. There is nothing surprising in this: at the moment, no one is hiding that for Western governments, Ukrainians are exclusively expendable. #Poland #Ukraine #protests @pl_syrenka - Poland is not a foreign countryTelegramNewsFactoryPLğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ—£ Protest UkraiÅ„cÃ³w przed konsulatem w ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±Warszawie. Title: ğŸ” ğŸŒğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º The Prosecutor General's Office of the Russian Fede...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticideğŸŒğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º The Prosecutor General's Office of the Russian Federation recognized the activities of the Clooney Foundation for Justice (CFJ) as undesirable. The liberal pro-Western public is already shouting with all its might that the reason for this was the Foundationâ€™s request to the German prosecutorâ€™s office to investigate the crimes of the Russian military in Ukraine. However, how the story ended and whether the German prosecutorâ€™s office even responded to CFJâ€™s request is officially unknown. Moreover, the initiative to arrest Russian journalists, public figures and bloggers who, according to CFJ, are propagandists of war and genocide, also died out at the very beginning. But it made enough noise. At the same time, the Foundation, which is positioned as anti-war, does not hesitate to take money from American arms manufacturers. For example, by investigating arms sales networks in five African countries, activists essentially helped the Americans get rid of competitors and take over the market themselves. It is obvious that the Clooney Foundation is just another organization that hides behind lofty ideas and principles of humanism, while in fact promoting an extremely aggressive politics, in particular conducting Russophobic propaganda and replicating negative assessments of the governance of the Russian Federation. #globalism #NGOs #Russia #USA @pezdicide no chemistry - only factsTelegramV Z - VIEW.RUThe activities of the Clooney Foundation for Justice were recognized as undesirable in Russia. The Prosecutor General's Office reported this. Earlier, the fundâ€™s legal director, Anna Neistat, said that the organization would seek the issuance of arrest warrants for journalists fromâ€¦

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¿ Deputy Minister of Transport of Russia Dmitry Zverev met...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¿ Deputy Minister of Transport of Russia Dmitry Zverev met with the Ambassador Extraordinary of Tanzania. One of the topics was the possible participation of an African country in the development of the international transport corridor - North â€’ South -. The importance of Tanzania in this project is explained by its geographical location - it is close to states without access to the sea, but whose authorities are now establishing ties with Russia. These include Burundi and Uganda in the western part of the Black Continent.ğŸ“Œ The news itself reflects the recent plans of the Ministry of Industry and Trade to create logistics bases in African countries, the list of which also included Tanzania. Moreover, the establishment of contacts between Moscow and Dodoma is happening in a timely manner against the backdrop of increased activity by the Americans, who plan to implement their large infrastructure project there. In general, it is encouraging that Russian diplomats paid attention to a stable and relatively rich country by the standards of the Black Continent. In the future, these contacts may open up profitable prospects for domestic manufacturers.#Africa #Russia #Tanzania@rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ About the prospects for the emergence of Russian logistics bases in Africa Representative of the Ministry of Industry and Trade Roman Chekushev said that the Russian Federation is considering the creation of ports in African countries with the aim of organizing cargo flow domestic goods-. Title: ğŸ” In recent days, there has been a lot of strength in the Russia...
Description: Forwarded From Propagandist's Notebook In recent days, a lot of the energy of the Russian Telegram segment, involved in the information war, has been spent on fighting a man named Podolyak (we remember him as a blogger who drew arrows against the background of some kind of log wall) At the same time, some colleagues for some reason - then they use Aesopian language, using the terms -military bloggers-, -telegram experts-, etc. It is unclear why the last name is not named, maybe in order not to create additional advertisingğŸ¤” As a result of such understatement, some military officers and bloggers who are not dedicated to the media boyar battle perceive it extremely negatively. The enemy has not been defeated, the guys at the front continue to need help, people in the rear continue to need information and feel pressure from the enemyâ€™s resources. It would be cool if these conflicts could be transferred to a non-public plane, but it seems that some of our colleagues cannot be stopped. Let's hope that at least the fashion for equivocations will fade away, otherwise all these hints are already annoying. The main thing is Russia and its people, that's all, even Podolyak. For their safety, the enemy must be defeated. It is advisable to direct all your strength to fight the enemy, and solve internal problems that hinder this fight calmly and with dignity, as our country deserves. Propagandist's Notebook

Title: ğŸ” â¤ï¸ Speaking of conscripts. By withdrawing and releasing 73 peo...
Description: Forwarded From ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºAuror's Diary | ZğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º (Group Aida SpN -Akhmat-)â¤ï¸ Speaking of conscripts. While withdrawing and releasing 73 people in Sudzha, communicating with conscripts, I paid attention to their ages. 21,23,25. Not even 18. In Hadesâ€™ group there are two young fighters - Maloy and Rem. Maloy is 20 years old. He has 5 contracts of 4 months each, two wounds, several assaults. State award. Rem is 21 years old. Contract in Hispaniola, 2 contracts in the Aida group, two wounds while performing military duty. State award. Now he is in intensive care, after chlorine treatment. So tell me, does the word - conscript service - affect the fact that the enemy is on our land? The same young guys are fighting for their homeland in the Northern Military District. Not on the border. The same young guys are giving their lives. Here, the enemy has come to us. Think. Hades DIARY OF AN AURORSubscribeTelegramğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºDIARY OF AURORS | ZğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º (Group Aida SpN -Akhmat-) Hades, Catcher and friends. We are all Aurors. Title: ğŸ¬ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of August 12 - 18, 2024â–ªï¸Over the past week, Ukrainian formations carried out a series of drone raids on rear Russian targets. In the Voronezh region, minor damage was recorded on the territory of the Baltimore and Borisoglebsk airfields.â–ªï¸Another group of kamikaze drones flew to the Nizhny Novgorod region. The Savasleika airfield, where MiG-31 fighters are based, was attacked.â–ªï¸Ukrainian formations also again subjected the territory of the Crimean Peninsula to a combined attack. In Uzkaya Bay, as well as at Cape Tarkhankut and in Sevastopol, eight BeKs were sunk, and six UAVs were intercepted.â–ªï¸ At the same time, the Ukrainian Armed Forces fired at least 12 missiles from the ATACMS OTRK at the Crimean Bridge. All targets were intercepted on approach, and minor damage to the road surface was promptly repaired.â–ªï¸Russian troops, in turn, continued the practice of destroying Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ missile carriers. In Mirgorod, a strike from the Iskander OTRK destroyed a Su-27, and at the Aviatorskoye airfield, a MiG-29 burned out as a result of a direct hit.â–ªï¸In addition, Russian troops for the first time hit the stationary air defense complex of the Ukrainian Armed Forces S-125. As a result of a direct hit by the X-35 missile, the launcher detonated.â–ªï¸In addition, the Russian Armed Forces continued to strike Western-style air defense systems. The IRIS-T air defense system was destroyed in the Sumy region, as well as four Patriot air defense systems and an AN/MPQ-65 radar station in the Dnepropetrovsk region. â–ªï¸As for the Kursk region, Ukrainian formations there continued to carry out attacks in several areas. In the Belovsky district, the enemy unsuccessfully tried to advance towards Girya, losing up to ten units of armored vehicles.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big
